entry.title: mktime
entry.content:
```go package main

import "fmt" import "os" import "time"

import "strconv"

func main() {

arg_num := len(os.Args)
if arg_num == 2 {
    if os.Args[1] == "-n" {
        t := time.Now().Unix()
        fmt.Println(t)
    } else {
        showMsg()
    }
} else if arg_num == 3 {
    if os.Args[1] == "-s" {
        timestamp, _ := strconv.Atoi(os.Args[2])
        fmt.Println(time.Unix(int64(timestamp), 0).String())
    } else {
        showMsg()
    }
} else if arg_num == 4 {
    if os.Args[1] == "-d" {
        t, _ := time.Parse("2006-01-02 15:04:05", os.Args[2]+" "+os.Args[3])
        fmt.Println(t.Unix())
    } else {
        showMsg()
    }
} else {
    showMsg()
}

}

func showMsg() {

fmt.Println("Bad args")
fmt.Println("Usage:")
fmt.Println("    -n: 返回当前时间的时间戳")
fmt.Println("    -s [+时间戳]: 将时间戳转化为具体时间")
fmt.Println("    -d [+具体时间]: 将具体时间转化为时间戳")

} ```
